From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To specify the level of prompting, use the **file prompt** command in global configuration mode.

ParaDef.Info: (Optional) Prompts only for destructive file operations. This is the default.

Examples: The following example configures confirmation prompting for all file operations:
ExtraInfo: Use this command to change the amount of confirmation needed for different file operations.This command affects only prompts for confirmation of operations. The router will always prompt for missing information.
